pageContext.claim: “Gallup just gave us the highest rating ever for the way we are handling the CoronaVirus situation.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referring to a February Gallup poll that found 77 percent of Americans are very or somewhat confident in the government’s ability to handle a Coronavirus outbreak. It did not ask about Trump specifically. Moreover, the poll was released when the country had few known cases and no known deaths from cover-19.
